QuestData.Title: Defiler's Advanced Care Package
QuestData.RewardText: You've certainly begun to prove yourself to us, $N. As a reward, please take this care package! Inside it you'll find rations and bandages that are usable only inside Arathi Basin.$B$BAs you continue to prove yourself inside the Basin, you'll find that these items can make the difference between life and death. We need you in top fighting shape if we're to achieve victory!
